form.question: Would you like to progress to the 2nd stage?

hint.text: Please note that if you wish to do so, you’ll not be able to edit your capability assessment, unless you delete the whole event and start again from the beginning.

items.text: I'm not ready yet, I need to edit my capability assessment

hint.text: You’ll be taken back to your capability assessment where you’ll be able to edit anything you’ve done previously. When you edit a screen, you’ll have to view the new ranked supplier list in order to progress with the next steps.

Please note that if you wish to do so, you’ll be taken to a confirmation screen where you’ll be able to download the ranked list of suppliers and progress to the next stage outside our service if needed.

backJump.title: Return to Write and publish your requirements
